title: The Lonely Guy (1984) DVDRip XviD
description:
The one and only Steve Martin stars along with Charles Grodin and Judith Ivey in a funny and poignant romance inspired by Bruce Jay Friedman&#039;s tongue-in-cheek survival manual. The Lonely Guy follows the progress of Larry (Martin) and his buddy Warren (Grodin) as they attempt to eke out a successful social life in the Big Apple. They&#039;re losers, until one day, Larry writes a book that turns lonliness into the ultimate love potion, and life is never the same.
